title: “Get Vaccinated For Others” WAS A LIE! Pfizer Vaccine Was NEVER TESTED ON PREVENTING TRANSMISSION!!!
cleaned_text:
Pfizer executive Janine Small just admitted to the European Parliament that Pfizer did not test the vaccine for preventing transmission of Covid prior to making it public!

The CDC followed by politicians and news anchors alike then pushed the lie that “you must get vaccinated for the sake of others” on a trusting and captivated audience.

This scandalous, unscientific and immoral act is what led friends, family members and neighbours to turn on each other over fears of making each other sick if they were unvaccinated.

In this video Dan Dicks of Press For Truth covers the latest Covid-19(84) news while also congratulating the “fringe” element of society who didn’t succumb to medical tyranny.

If you appreciate my efforts please consider making a contribution here:

Or you can send an e-transfer to dan@pressfortruth.ca

If you’re old fashioned like we are and prefer to keep it old school, we also accept cash, cheques, equipment and words of encouragement! You can send us those things here:
